thread.title: BRIEF-Xerox Confirmed Talks With Fujifilm For Potential Increase In Consideration To Be Received By Xerox Shareholders In Proposed Deal

title: BRIEF-Xerox Confirmed Talks With Fujifilm For Potential Increase In Consideration To Be Received By Xerox Shareholders In Proposed Deal

organizations.name: xerox shareholders in proposed deal reuters

text:
Market News April 27, 2018 / 11:52 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Xerox Confirmed Talks With Fujifilm For Potential Increase In Consideration To Be Received By Xerox Shareholders In Proposed Deal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Fujifilm Holdings Corp:
* XEROX - CONFIRMED TALKS WITH FUJIFILM FOR POTENTIAL INCREASE IN CONSIDERATION TO BE RECEIVED BY XEROX SHAREHOLDERS IN PROPOSED DEAL WITH FUJI XEROX Source text: [ bit.ly/2I42mJW ] Further company coverage:
